name: blog-image-prompter
description: Analyzes blog content and generates detailed AI image prompts for Google Vertex AI, Midjourney, DALL-E, or other image generators. Creates SEO-optimized filenames and alt text for each image.
triggers: create image prompts for this blog
I need images for this blog
capabilities: Blog content analysis for image opportunities
AI image prompt generation (Vertex AI, Midjourney, DALL-E)
Brand aesthetic consistency (UK homes, natural lighting, warm tones)
Multiple image types: hero, section, product, infographic
outputFormat: Detailed prompts ready to paste into image generators, with filenames, alt text, and placement suggestions for each image
